item.description:

item.title: 12 Health Benefits of Lemon Water During Pregnancy
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:

item.title: 12 Health Benefits of Duck Eggs
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Duck eggs are rich in nutrients and vitamins compared to chicken eggs. They contain high levels of vitamin D, B12, E, K2,, and calcium. They also have higher fat content and lower cholesterol than chicken eggs. Duck eggs are a great source of nutrition. They provide a balanced amount of protein, carbohydrates, fats, and minerals.… Read More »12 Health Benefits of Duck Eggs

item.title: 10 Surprising Benefits of Eggplant For Anemia
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Iron is an essential mineral that helps your body produce red blood cells. If you’re anemic, then you need to increase the amount of iron in your diet. One of the best ways to do this is by eating foods rich in iron. Eggplants are among those foods. They contain a lot of iron, as… Read More »10 Surprising Benefits of Eggplant For Anemia
